comments:
I got the following exception in my .log when using the 

org.eclipse.core.runtime/debug=true
org.eclipse.core.runtime/registry/debug=true
org.eclipse.core.runtime/registry/debug/dump=
org.eclipse.core.runtime/debug=false

Basically I turned on runtime/debug and runtime/registry/debug in the runtime 
plugin's .options file.  I don't want a registry dump so did not spec a 
location.


!MESSAGE Unable to create output stream for registry debug information in "\".
!STACK 0
java.io.FileNotFoundException: \ (The system cannot find the path specified)
	at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method)
	at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:116)
	at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:76)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.plugins.PluginRegistry.debugRegistry
(PluginRegistry.java:244)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.loaderShutdown
(InternalPlatform.java:522)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.shutdown
(InternalBootLoader.java:979)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.boot.InternalBootLoader.run
(InternalBootLoader.java:850)
	at org.eclipse.core.boot.BootLoader.run(BootLoader.java:461)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Native Method)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:247)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:703)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:539)

See PluginRegistry.debugRegistry(String).
At some point we need to make sure that the path being passed to us is not 
empty. (we do an isValid check but we need to do more)

Is this still an issue?  is the code fixed or just no longer included in the 
rutnime?
The org.eclipse.core.runtime/registry/debug/dump option is not used anymore.

traces.message: \ (The system cannot find the path specified)
